text: Hans Denissen (born 9 March 1984 in Tilburg) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays indoor soccer for Major Arena Soccer League side Milwaukee Wave. ==Club career== Denissen started his career with amateur side SvSSS from Udenhout. Here, he was discovered by hometown club, Willem II Tilburg. After going through their youth department, he was picked for the first team squad in the summer of 2003. After his first three years, he signed with RBC Roosendaal. The following season, he joined MVV, and it looked like he would spend his career in the second division of Dutch league football. Surprisingly, he transferred to Cypriot side Ayia Napa FC in Summer 2008. The following season, he moved to Finland and joined FC Haka. After only a few months, he found his way back to his home country and to the second division, as he joined FC Emmen. FC Emmen haalt Denissen terug naar Nederland In the summer of 2011 he rejoined former team Willem II on an amateur contract to play in the second team.Hans Denissen terug bij Willem II, Omroep Brabant, 31 August 2011 Denissen signed with San Antonio Scorpions FC of the North American Soccer League on 9 January 2012.http://www.nasl.com/index.php?id=3&newsid;=1631 During the 2013 regular season, he made 25 appearances and was named to the NASL Best XI. The New York Cosmos signed Denissen on 2 January 2014. Denissen made his Cosmos' debut on 28 May 2014, coming on as a second-half substitute in the team's 2–0 win over the Brooklyn Italians in the U.S. Open Cup.https://int.soccerway.com/matches/2014/05/29/united-states/us-open-cup/ny- cosmos/brooklyn-italians/1681603/?ICID=PL_MS_05 Denissen appeared in his first NASL game for the Cosmos on 8 June 2014, coming in as a substitute in the 74th minute of the team's 1–0 win over Ottawa Fury FC.http://www.nycosmos.com/matchcenter/gsmid/1620562 He returned to San Antonio to face his former club for the first time on 1 November 2014, coming on as a substitute in the 68th minute of the team's 1-0 road loss.http://www.nycosmos.com/matchcenter/gsmid/1634360 Just one week later, he came on as a substitute again in extra time of the team's 2-1 semifinal loss in San Antonio against a Scorpions side that would go on to win The Championship. Denissen made five starts in 11 regular season appearances for the Cosmos in 2014 and was tied for second on the team with three assists. After his release from New York Cosmos, Denissen signed with Atlanta Silverbacks in February 2015.http://www.nasl.com/article/uuid/1dw6xbrc63dsn14gtuta0uj2bk/hans- denissen-aiming-to-rekindle-best-xi-form-with-silverbacks#.VOcb2OasXzw ==International== In 2005, he was a substitute in an official friendly match for the Netherlands national under-21 football team.Invalbeurt Hans Denissen , Tilbo.ocm, 1 September 2005 ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tilburg Category:Dutch footballers Category:Netherlands under-21 international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Willem II (football club) players Category:RBC Roosendaal players Category:MVV Maastricht players Category:Ayia Napa FC players Category:FC Haka players Category:FC Emmen players Category:San Antonio Scorpions players Category:New York Cosmos (2010) players Category:Atlanta Silverbacks players Category:Milwaukee Wave players Category:Dutch expatriate footballers Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland Category:Dutch expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Cypriot Second Division players Category:North American Soccer League players Category:Major Arena Soccer League players
title: Hans Denissen
